Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in WWII-era Japan, the beginnings of his career as an activist and critic, and his family life in the following decades.
